content.p: Sketch the angle \theta = \frac{\pi}{ {{denom}} } on the unit circle. Also, report the values of \cos\left( \frac{\pi}{ {{denom}} } \right) and \sin\left( \frac{\pi}{ {{denom}} } \right).

outtro.p: The cosine of the given angle is {{cosQ1}}. The sine of the given angle is {{sinQ1}}.

Sketch the angle \theta = {{angle}} on the unit circle. Also, explain and demonstrate how to use your answers to the previous task to help you report the values for each of the six trigonometric functions
\sin(\theta), \cos(\theta),\tan(\theta), \cot(\theta),\sec(\theta),\csc(\theta).
